feature.name: UE Throughput-Aware IFLB
feature.summary: The UE Throughput-Aware IFLB feature estimates and compares UE throughput in the

parameters.name: LoadBalancingFunction.lbUeEvaluationTimer
parameters.description: Timer to initiate evaluation of a UE for load balancing measurement.                                 The timer is started at UE Context Setup.

parameters.name: EUtranCellFDD.lbTpNonQualFraction
parameters.description: Configures the fraction of UEs to be non-qualified for                                 throughput-aware load balancing.

parameters.name: EUtranCellTDD.lbTpNonQualFraction
parameters.description: Configures the fraction of UEs to be non-qualified for                                 throughput-aware load balancing.

parameters.name: EUtranCellFDD.lbTpRankThreshMin
parameters.description: Configures a minimum relative gain threshold for throughput-aware                                 load balancing.

parameters.name: EUtranCellTDD.lbTpRankThreshMin
parameters.description: Configures a minimum relative gain threshold for throughput-aware                                 load balancing.

parameters.name: EUtranCellFDD.loadBalancing
parameters.description: Indicator for whether the Inter-frequency Load Balancing feature is                                 allowed from the current cell and towards the cell indicated by the                                 cell relation. This must be activated to allow the UE                                 Throughput-Aware IFLB towards the cell.

parameters.name: EUtranCellFDD.cellSubscriptionCapacity
parameters.description: Subscription capacity of the cell.  The value represents the total capacity of the cell. It is used for                                 traffic load balancing purposes.

parameters.name: QciProfilePredefined.qciSubscriptionQuanta
parameters.description: Subscription quantity associated with the specific predefined                                 QCI.  The value specifies the subscription cost of a bearer with this                                 predefined profile. The subscription cost is used for traffic load                                 balancing purposes.

parameters.name: QciProfilePredefined.qciSubscriptionQuanta                                 (Operator Defined)
parameters.description: Subscription quantity associated with the specific operator-defined                                 QCI.  The value specifies the subscription cost of a bearer with this                                 operator defined profile. The subscription cost is used for traffic                                 load balancing purposes.

parameters.name: LoadBalancingFunction.lbThreshold
parameters.description: Minimum load (subscription ratio) difference to trigger load                                 balancing action.

parameters.name: ReportConfigEUtraInterFreqLb.a5Threshold1Rsrp
parameters.description: Maximum load (subscription ratio) difference taken into account in                                 load balancing action.

parameters.name: ReportConfigEUtraInterFreqLb.a5Threshold2Rsrp
parameters.description: RSRP threshold 2 value for A5 measurement.

parameters.name: ReportConfigEUtraInterFreqLb.a5Threshold2Rsrq
parameters.description: RSRQ threshold 2 value for A5 measurement.

parameters.name: ReportConfigEUtraInterFreqLb.hysteresisA5
parameters.description: Hysteresis value for A5 measurement.

parameters.name: EUtranFreqRelation.lbA5Thr1RsrpFreqOffset
parameters.description: The frequency-relation specific offset for the absolute threshold                                     a5Threshold1Rsrp, RSRP threshold1 for event                                 A5.

parameters.name: EUtranCellFDD.lbUeEvaluationTimer
parameters.description: Used to configure a short timer value for evaluating load balancing                                 of incoming intra-frequency HO UEs per E-UTRAN cell. The eNodeB                                 starts the EUtranCellFDD.lbUeEvaluationTimer with                                 the configured short timer value upon completing an incoming                                 intra-frequency HO.

parameters.name: EUtranCellTDD.lbUeEvaluationTimer
parameters.description: Used to configure a short timer value for evaluating load balancing                                 of incoming intra-frequency HO UEs per E-UTRAN cell. The eNodeB                                 starts the EUtranCellTDD.lbUeEvaluationTimer with                                 the configured short timer value upon completing an incoming                                 intra-frequency HO.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_EVENT_UE_LB_MEAS
parameters.description: Number of UEs evaluated before choosing UE for load balancing                                     related measurements. If UE Throughput Aware IFLB feature is                                     operable, then the parameter shows the number of UEs that are                                     setup before choosing UE for load balancing related                                     measurements.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_EVENT_UE_LB_QUAL
parameters.description: Indicates the reason for not proceeding with a load balancing or                                     Carrier Aggregation (CA) triggered redirection action when a                                     measurement report is received from the UE:    CA criteria not met     Reported cell is not a valid load balancing target     Reported cell is a valid target, but                                                 lbAmount has already been                                             satisfied for the cell     Service Specific Load Management (SSLM) related                                             restrictions     Throughput criteria not met

parameters.name: Uen.BF
parameters.description: Parameter mentioned in documentation

parameters.name: EUtranCellFDD.lbActionForEndcUe
parameters.description: Parameter mentioned in documentation

parameters.name: EUtranCellTDD.lbActionForEndcUe
parameters.description: Parameter mentioned in documentation

parameters.name: RobustCallSetup.intraLteMobilityDelayEnabled
parameters.description: Parameter mentioned in documentation

parameters.name: QciProfileOperatorDefined.qciSubscriptionQuanta
parameters.description: Parameter mentioned in documentation

parameters.name: EUtranCellRelation.loadBalancing
parameters.description: Parameter mentioned in documentation

events.name: INTERNAL_EVENT_UE_LB_MEAS
events.description: Number of UEs evaluated before choosing UE for load balancing                                     related measurements. If UE Throughput Aware IFLB feature is                                     operable, then the parameter shows the number of UEs that are                                     setup before choosing UE for load balancing related                                     measurements.

events.name: INTERNAL_EVENT_UE_LB_QUAL
events.description: Indicates the reason for not proceeding with a load balancing or                                     Carrier Aggregation (CA) triggered redirection action when a                                     measurement report is received from the UE:    CA criteria not met     Reported cell is not a valid load balancing target     Reported cell is a valid target, but                                                 lbAmount has already been                                             satisfied for the cell     Service Specific Load Management (SSLM) related                                             restrictions     Throughput criteria not met

feature.activation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to ACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4011911 MO instance.
feature.deactivation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to DEACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4011911 MO instance.
